idea-plugin.name: Spring Transaction Inspector
idea-plugin.description:
Spring Transaction Inspector

Catch Spring @Transactional pitfalls before they reach production! This plugin performs static analysis to detect common transaction anti-patterns and configuration issues.

ðŸŽ¯ Key Features (8 Inspections)

  • AOP Proxy Bypass Detection - Warns when calling @Transactional methods within the same class
  • Invalid Method Modifiers - Detects @Transactional on private/final/static methods that Spring cannot intercept
  • Transaction Propagation Conflicts - Detects MANDATORY/NEVER/REQUIRES_NEW conflicts that cause runtime exceptions or data inconsistency
  • N+1 Query Detection - Identifies lazy-loaded relationships (@OneToMany, @ManyToOne, etc.) accessed in loops and streams
  • ReadOnly Transaction Violations - Detects write operations in @Transactional(readOnly=true) methods
  • Checked Exception Rollback - Warns when checked exceptions won't trigger rollback without proper configuration
  • @Async + @Transactional Conflicts - Detects when transactions won't propagate to async threads
  • ReadOnly Calling Write Methods - Smart detection of propagation conflicts between read-only and write transactions
  • Visual Indicators - Gutter icons show transactional methods at a glance
  • Quick Fixes - One-click solutions for common issues
  • Fully Customizable - Enable/disable specific inspections in Settings

ðŸ’¡ Perfect For

  • Spring Boot developers working with JPA/Hibernate
  • Teams wanting to catch transaction bugs during code review
  • Developers learning Spring transaction management best practices

idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 1.0.2 - Enhanced Detection (Latest)

  • New Inspection: Transaction Propagation Conflict Detection
    • MANDATORY: Detects calls without active transaction (prevents IllegalTransactionStateException)
    • NEVER: Detects calls within transactional context (prevents IllegalTransactionStateException)
    • REQUIRES_NEW: Warns about independent transaction creation and data inconsistency risks
  • N+1 Query Detection Improvements:
    • Now detects @ManyToOne(fetch = LAZY) - single entity relationships
    • Now detects @OneToOne(fetch = LAZY) - single entity relationships
    • Accurate detection based on fetch type defaults (LAZY vs EAGER)
  • Total Inspections: 8 comprehensive checks for Spring @Transactional anti-patterns

Version 1.0.1 - Major Improvements

  • Fixed memory leak in AddRollbackForFix
  • Type-based write operation detection (95%+ accuracy)
  • Repository class caching for performance
  • All inspections now have settings toggles

Version 1.0.0 - Initial Release

  • 7 inspections for @Transactional anti-patterns
  • Quick Fixes, Gutter icons, Customizable settings
